units.title: Unit 1 — Topic 1 (A1)
units.cultural_notes: Overview of cultural context for unit 1 in Igbo.

dialogue.notes: This dialogue models a simple social exchange in Igbo. Include cultural note about greetings.

cultural.note: Culture note for Igbo: greetings, gestures, politeness. Tip: use local honorifics where appropriate.

exercises.prompt: Repeat: Hello - sample line in Igbo.
Play both roles in the dialogue.
Translate 'thank you' to Igbo
